code: import{addPost}from'../../../redux/postsRedux';import PostForm from'../PostForm/PostForm';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AddPostForm=function AddPostForm(){var navigate=useNavigate();var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(post){dispatch(addPost(post));navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostForm,{action:handleSubmit,actionText:"Add Post"});};export default AddPostForm;
